title: Which is the best?
content:
what do you think is the best Keen game?
1-6,dreams,GBC?

I think that keen 5 was the best myself.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-shockshund.gif[/img]

title: Re: Which is the best?
content:
I think this would be better placed in the Keen Voting Booth, but I may be wrong. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

IMKO, the best of the first three games is Keen 3 -- definitely. The best of the second three (not counting Keen 3.5) is Keen 5. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] If the universe were toast, what jelly would you put on it?

title: Re: Which is the best?
content:
First trilogy - Keen 3!
Second trilogy - Keen 6!
Third trilogy - Man, it really sucks that there is no third trilogy!Couldn't he just use the pogo!?

title: Re: Which is the best?
content:
